title: [bug] Code signing of generated binary is being invalidated

labels.name: scope: bundler
labels.description: The bundler used in our cli to make installers

body:
### Describe the bug

Binary patch to set "package type" is modifying the binary after signing. This is invalidating the signature and windows is detecting this as an "unsigned package"

### Reproduction

1. Setup code signing for binary
2. Package binary as windows MSI. 
3. the binary in produced package does not have valid signature

### Expected behavior

Binary in the produced package have valid signature
